name: WP Category Thumbnail
author: NetTantra

sections.description:
This plugin provides thumbnails for categories fetched from the latest page/post of the corresponding category. The post thumbnails are generated from its featured image in the post.

About the Developer

This Plugin is developed by NetTantra Technologies – a team of open-source enthusiasts and WordPress experts. NetTantra designers and developers work relentlessly to bring code to life so that WordPress users don’t have to do the hard work.

For professional support, you can get in touch with the NetTantra Team at wordpress@nettantra.com

Plugin Support

WP Category Thumbnail
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin

Features

  • Show thumbnails for latest page/post of the corresponding category
